title: PoolPal™ Corp.
description: This company specializes in the maintenance and monitoring of commercial and institutional swimming pools. This project involved the development of a comprehensive system, encompassing both administrative and customer-facing functionalities. Each section underwent independent design and implementation, ensuring a tailored and optimized user experience for both internal staff and external clients.

title: Peekage
description: With Peekage, marketers can target a specific audience, have a two-way communication channel with consumers, and re-target samplers based on their behavior.Creating a panel for marketing users and for defining advertising campaigns and displaying the amount of initial feedback was one of the features of the panel.

title: Righcar Corp.
description: This company offers smart car solutions and one of its products is a car diagnostic dongle for personal use. In order to manage information, an admin panel was needed, which managed users with a large volume of data and parameters sent from the dongle. In this project, I was the only member of the front-end team and I implemented the structures related to the admin panel. With the construction of this department, managers and sales experts were aware of the performance of dongles sold.

title: Caring Connected Car Solution
description: Here we were providing solutions for connected cars, our team consisted of hardware experts, software developers and user interface designers. As a front-end developer, I was developing the necessary tools with my colleagues in this company.

title: Andisheh Co.
description: The company worked on security solutions for web applications. At first I worked as a front-end developer using DevExpress components for winform desktop applications. Then I started developing in C# for back-end aspects of company applications.

title: Arttem Studio
description: At this company, I designed clients websites using WordPress.

title: DPCO Group
description: We were working on the product of this company called Hubco Network, which is a product price inquiry service.
